column2: SELECT G.objID, G.ra, G.dec, GN.distance, PZ.z as photoz, PZ.zErr as photoz_err, S.z as specz FROM Galaxy as G JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (#, #, #) AS GN ON G.objID = GN.objID JOIN Photoz AS PZ ON PZ.objID = GN.objID LEFT JOIN Specobj AS S ON PZ.objID = S.bestObjID union all (SELECT G.objID, G.ra, G.dec, GN.distance, PZ.z as photoz, PZ.zErr as photoz_err, S.z as specz FROM Galaxy as G JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (#, #, #) AS GN ON G.objID = GN.objID JOIN Photoz AS PZ ON PZ.objID = GN.objID LEFT JOIN Specobj AS S ON PZ.objID = S.bestObjID) union all (SELECT G.objID, G.ra, G.dec, GN.distance, PZ.z as photoz, PZ.zErr as photoz_err, S.z as specz FROM Galaxy as G JOIN dbo.fGetNearbyObjEq (#, #, #) AS GN ON G.objID = GN.objID JOIN Photoz AS PZ ON PZ.objID = GN.objID LEFT JOIN Specobj AS S ON PZ.objID = S.bestObjID)
